titleStmt.title: The true copy of tvvo letters, with their seuerall answeres, contayning the late apostasie of the Earle of Lauall, after his returne from Italy VVherein the principall poynts in controuersie with the papists, are learnedly and fully confuted. By D. Tilenus. Faythfully translated by D.D.S.
titleStmt.author: Tilenus, Daniel, 1563-1633.
Coligny, Guy Paul de, 1555-1586, attributed name.
D. D. S.
Laval, Antoine de, 1550-1631, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Simon Stafford, for Nathanael Butter, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Churchyard, neere S. Austens Gate,

notesStmt.note: The Earl of Lavall may be either Guy Paul de Coligny, comte de Laval, or Antoine de Laval, sieur de Belair.
Running title reads: The late apostasie of the Earle of Lauall.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Churchyard, neere S. Austens Gate
